name: Artisan Workshop
context: Excavated from what appears to be a craftsman's workshop, these tablets were found scattered among tool fragments and pottery shards. The workspace shows evidence of metalworking and stone carving. Several tablets were found pressed into clay storage jars, suggesting they served as inventory or instruction records for apprentices.

texts.name: Tool Inventory
texts.notes: Found embedded in workbench. Script shows tool marks from repeated reference during work.

texts.name: Apprentice Instructions
texts.notes: Discovered in teaching area. Large, clear script designed for learning - shows repeated tracing.

texts.name: Material Order
texts.notes: Located near storage area. Formal script suggests communication with suppliers.

texts.name: Quality Check
texts.notes: Found among finished goods. Precise script with measurement marks along edges.

texts.name: Fire Management
texts.notes: Discovered near furnace remains. Heat-cracked but legible - shows forge temperature notes.

texts.name: Water Supply
texts.notes: Found near water basin. Casual script suggests daily routine documentation.

texts.name: Workshop Rules
texts.notes: Posted near workshop entrance. Authoritative script indicating master craftsman's rules.
